nodes.text: Pikka Adren was a human female contractor and the wife of Joss Adren, who she worked alongside during the construction of the Starlight Beacon space station. The two volunteered to help the combined Galactic Republic and Jedi Order effort to rescue the Hetzal system from debris of the Great Hyperspace Disaster. Adren piloted the Republic Longbeam Aurora III above the Fruited Moon of Hetzal Prime, and Pikka served as his co-pilot.
